about_the_game:
BASAULT VR is a virtual reality movement shooter. Run, jump, swing around on your grappling hook and shoot with a variety of complex yet familiar firearms. Use those tools to survive and reach the end of this roguelite!

*WARNING: do not play if you are prone to motion sickness*

This is the demo version, here's what you would get if you bought the full version:

+ 7 complex guns to play with
+ 12 hand-made arenas designed for swinging and shooting
+ Expanded game cycles and difficulty curve
+ 10 new songs during gameplay
+ 3 new powerups
+ Game progression including a end game timer and an etheral weapon progression system
+ Achievements and achievement weapon customisation system
+ Access to the training map

Thank you for playing! Even if you don't end up buying the full product, I really appreciate you taking the time to try out my game :)

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
